title: Work by variable force - evaluate sign of integral

content.question: A force exerted on an object as a function of the objectâ€™s position is given by the equation <math alttext="F of x equals, A x plus b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></math> where <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>b</mi></math> are positive constants with appropriate units, and no other force acts on the object. Which of the following statements best describes the work <math alttext="W sub F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mi>F</mi></msub></mstyle></math> done on the object by the force and the motion of the object as it moves from <math alttext="x equals 3 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="x equals 2 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="W sub F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mi>F</mi></msub></mstyle></math> is positive and the object speeds up
<math alttext="W sub F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mi>F</mi></msub></mstyle></math> is positive and the object slows down
<math alttext="W sub F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mi>F</mi></msub></mstyle></math> is negative and the object speeds up
<math alttext="W sub F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mi>F</mi></msub></mstyle></math> is negative and the object slows down

content.answer: <math alttext="W sub F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mi>F</mi></msub></mstyle></math> is negative and the object slows down

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
